casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Rayford Lewis BURKE 181A93-4 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 31, 2016 Franklin E. Wells, Jr., Attorney at Law, Asheboro, Gretchen Engel, Attorney at Law, Malcolm Ray Hunter, Jr., Attorney at Law, Durham, for Burke, Rayford Lewis. Danielle Marquis Elder, Special Deputy Attorney General, Mikko Red Arrow, Assistant District Attorney, Jonathan Babb, Special Deputy Attorney General, Jonathan P. Babb, Special Counsel to Attorney General, Sarah Kirkman, District Attorney, for State of N.C. Christopher A. Brook, Legal Director, Burton Craige, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, James Coleman, Attorney at Law, Irving Joyner, Attorney at Law, Durham, Cassandra Stubbs, Attorney at Law, for ACLU Capital Punishment Project, et al.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 30th of August 2016 by State of NC:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 31st of August 2016."

State of NC shall have up to and including the 24th day of October 20 16 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
